    • getUpdatedState

      protected FluidState getUpdatedState(net.minestom.server.instance.Instance instance, net.minestom.server.coordinate.BlockVec point, FluidState original)
      Gets the updated state of a fluid block by taking into account its surrounding blocks.

    • getSpread

      protected Map<net.minestom.server.instance.block.BlockFace, FluidState> getSpread(net.minestom.server.instance.Instance instance, net.minestom.server.coordinate.BlockVec point, FluidState flowing)
      Returns a map with the directions the water can flow in and the block the water will become in that direction. If a hole is found within getHoleRadius() blocks, the water will only flow in that direction. A weight is used to determine which hole is the closest.

    • getWeight
